summary: Abstract base class that represents a node in the internal expression tree used by Qiskit. It is never instantiated directly and is not intended for user subclassing; concrete subclasses define their own type attribute and inherit common behavior such as the visitorâ€‘pattern accept helper.
business_intent: Provide a stable, internal foundation for building and traversing expression trees that model quantum circuit components, enabling consistent manipulation, optimization, and evaluation within the Qiskit library.
